item.title:

item.description:
NEW: The dealmaking frenzy in the Middle East is paying off for one veteran banker.

item.title: 国债市场等待 FOMC 会议纪要和长端债券销售
item.description: Treasury Market Awaits FOMC Meeting Minutes, Long-End Bond Sales trib.al/VW1ojRE

item.title: 在岸交易员农历新年假期归来，中国股市萎靡不振
item.description: Chinese stocks languished as onshore traders returned from the Lunar New Year holidays trib.al/2LslND4

item.title: 中国游客利用国庆长假前往香港、澳门和海外旅游的人数创下历年之最
item.description: Chinese tourists tapped a lengthy national holiday to travel to Hong Kong, Macau and overseas in the largest numbers they have in years trib.al/LwEpIzk

item.title: 新西兰财政部长 Caralee McLiesh 就国家财政状况发出警告
item.description: New Zealand Treasury Secretary Caralee McLiesh has issued a warning about the state of the country’s finances trib.al/bF5k2Bo

item.title: 林吉特持续下滑，距离历史最低点仅有一线之隔
item.description: The ongoing slide in the ringgit puts it a whisker away from a record low trib.al/B8wKvmo

item.title: 普拉博沃-苏比安托即将成为印度尼西亚的下一任领导人，他将继承前任领导人的使命，带领这个拥有万亿美元资产的经济体走出中等收入陷阱。
item.description: Set to be Indonesia’s next leader, Prabowo Subianto will soon inherit his predecessor’s mission to break the trillion-dollar economy out of the middle-income trap trib.al/svudXVQ

item.title: 据一家新西兰供应商称，尽管中国出生率下降，经济复苏乏力，但预计中国婴儿配方奶粉市场将长期保持稳定。
item.description: China’s infant milk formula market is expected to stabilize over the long term despite the country’s falling birth rate and sluggish economic recovery, according to a New Zealand supplier trib.al/UvtDFGZ

item.title: 根据决议基金会（Resolution Foundation）的数据，高收入的英国银行家、律师和咨询师现在是最容易受到贸易冲击影响的劳动者之一。
item.description: High-earning British bankers, lawyers and consultants are now some of the workers most vulnerable to trade shocks, according to the Resolution Foundation trib.al/JFR2BNH

item.title: RT by @markets：出来了：任天堂股价在周末有关 Switch 后继机上市时间将推迟至 2025 年的报道后大幅下跌。该公司的股价曾因今年上市的预期而上涨。
item.description:
Out: Nintendo share price is falling sharply after weekend reports of Switch successor launch will be delayed to 2025. The company's share prices had been rising on expectations the launch is this year.
bloomberg.com/news/articles/…

item.title: 有报道称任天堂将推迟推出 Switch 2，任天堂股价暴跌达 8.5
item.description: Nintendo shares tumble as much as 8.5% after reports it's delaying the launch of the Switch 2 trib.al/JW0XBlS

item.title: 苏娜克（Rishi Sunak）的政府计划赋予英格兰地方议会控制短期出租房数量的权力，规定短期出租房必须遵守规划规则。
item.description: Rishi Sunak’s government plans to give local councils in England power to control the number of properties built for short-term lets by making them subject to planning rules trib.al/oO5bE72

item.title: 英国立法者称，英国加入《跨太平洋伙伴关系全面进步协议》贸易集团的益处尚不明确，这是对首相里希-苏纳克脱欧后贸易政策的又一次打击。
item.description: British lawmakers said the benefits of the UK’s accession to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership trading bloc are unclear, in another blow to Prime Minister Rishi Sunak’s post-Brexit trade policy. trib.al/m2kNngL

item.description: Here’s the latest news and analysis on the oil market trib.al/Oz6qX4R

item.title: 备受期待的日本退出超宽松货币政策可能会产生不同寻常的效果，使股市成为加息的最大受益者
item.description: Japan’s much-anticipated exit from its ultra-easy monetary policy is likely to have the unusual effect of making the equity market the biggest beneficiary from interest-rate hikes trib.al/J7EsvYA

item.title: 一位孟加拉国政客的 2 亿英镑地产帝国引发了人们对英国外国财产所有权法律的严重质疑。
item.description: The £200 million property empire of one Bangladeshi politician is triggering serious questions about the UK's foreign property ownership laws trib.al/TeNW6k7

item.title: 中国假日消费大增。任天堂将推迟推出 Switch 的后续产品。他信-西那瓦在泰国获释。您今天需要了解的信息
item.description: China experiences a holiday spending boost. Nintendo set to delay Switch successor. Thaksin Shinawatra freed from detention in Thailand. Here’s what you need to know today. trib.al/Rgmr2P2

item.title: 周二，澳大利亚石油和天然气生产商 Strike Energy 因关键气井出现问题导致股价暴跌，股价一度下跌近三分之一。
item.description: Australian oil and gas producer Strike Energy lost almost a third of its value at one point on Tuesday as the company’s shares plunged due to problems at a key gas well trib.al/EQDiAXx

item.title: 新加坡一家初创公司正在剥离旧飞机以制造电动汽车电池外壳，称其可以替代 12 个铝土矿的产量
item.description: A Singapore startup is stripping old planes to make EV battery casings, saying it can replace the output of 12 bauxite mines trib.al/Tkf3uTk

item.title: 新西兰储备银行似乎将再次提高利率--掉期交易员称这一举措将被迅速平仓
item.description: The Reserve Bank of New Zealand looks set to raise interest rates again — a move that swap traders say will be rapidly unwound trib.al/vHito3L

item.title:
即将卸任的印尼总统佐科-维多多（Joko Widodo）的经济政策是否能够延续，是这个东南亚市值最大的股票市场的投资者最关心的问题。
以下是 ⬇️
item.description:
Continuity of outgoing Indonesian President Joko Widodo’s economic policies is the main concern of investors in Southeast Asia’s largest equity market by capitalization.

Here's what matters ⬇️ trib.al/nJZTBR3

item.title: 印度尼西亚周三举行的大选引发了人们的疑问，即该国希望成为电动汽车中心的努力是否能带来足够的经济利益，从而抵消环境风险。
item.description: Indonesia’s election on Wednesday is raising questions over whether the nation’s bid to become an electric-vehicle hub poses enough economic benefit to outweigh environmental risks trib.al/PgCJiGv

item.title: 菲律宾中央银行不遗余力地防止比索汇率跌破 1 美元兑 57 比索的关键点位。但这一切可能都是徒劳的，因为不断上涨的油价和大幅降息的前景可能会重创比索。
item.description: The Philippine central bank has spared no expense in preventing the peso weakening past the crucial 57 per dollar level. It may all be for nothing as rising oil prices and the prospect of hefty interest-rate cuts threaten to bludgeon the currency trib.al/fMHIEaC

item.title:
新消息：在一场关于金钱、粮食和气候变化的全球文化战争中，农业正成为一个关键战场。
阅读《大事件》 ⬇️
item.description:
NEW: Agriculture is becoming a key battleground in a global culture war over money, food and climate change.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ trib.al/iVToZpV

item.title: 日本最新的经济增长数据将证实其去年已滑落至世界第四大经济体，这反映出日本货币疲软和人口老龄化的影响。
item.description: Japan’s latest growth figures are set to confirm it slipped to fourth-largest economy in the world last year, a development that reflects the impact of its feeble currency and aging demographics trib.al/rvTAsV1

item.title: 英国今天将与尼日利亚签署一项新的投资协议，旨在促进双边贸易并减少商业壁垒
item.description: The UK will today sign a new investment deal with Nigeria that aims to boost bilateral trade and reduce commercial barriers trib.al/IdrxBdg
